channel.title: Desert Sands Unified School District on Jobs in the Desert
channel.description: Recent content in Desert Sands Unified School District on Jobs in the Desert

item.title: Desert Sands USD Job Updates February 01, 2019
item.description: Added: Life Guard Removed: Jackson Elementary 2018-2019: Kindergarten Classroom Teacher

item.title: Desert Sands USD Job Updates January 29, 2019
item.description: Desert Sands Unified School District added a transfer only position which appears to be a reposting of job that was removed today. Added: Custodian (D) (Truman) (Transfer Only) Removed: Custodian (N) (Truman) (Transfer Only)

item.title: Desert Sands USD Job Updates January 28, 2019
item.description: Desert Sands Unified School District added a promotional opportunity. Added: Administrative Specialist (Promotional Only)

item.title: Desert Sands USD Job Updates January 23, 2019
item.description: Desert Sands Unified School District closed two transfer only positions and made a Speech-Language Pathologist position available. The posting date for the position is listed as July 5th 2018. Added: Speech-Language Pathologist Removed: Administrative Assistant/Bilingual (CWA) (Transfer Only) Paraeducator/Special Education (Hoover) (Transfer Only)

item.title: Now Tracking: Desert Sands Unified School District
item.description: Now tracking Desert Sands Unified School District. RSS feed is now available.
